005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * Provides a Java type adapter implementation for data types that are based on
015 * {@link ICustomJavaDataType}.
016 *
017 * @param <TYPE>
018 *          the Java type this adapter supports, which is based on
019 *          {@link ICustomJavaDataType}
020 * @param <ITEM_TYPE>
021 *          the Metapath item type associated with the adapter
022 */
023public abstract class AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter<
024    TYPE extends ICustomJavaDataType<TYPE>,
025    ITEM_TYPE extends IAnyAtomicItem>
026    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<TYPE, ITEM_TYPE> {
027
028  /**
029   * Construct a new Java type adapter for the class based on
030   * {@link ICustomJavaDataType}.
031   *
032   * @param valueClass
033   *          a data type class based on {@link ICustomJavaDataType}
034   * @param itemClass
035   *          the Java type of the Metapath item this adapter supports
036   * @param castExecutor
037   *          the method to call to cast an item to an item based on this type
038   */
039  public AbstractCustomJavaDataTypeAdapter(
040      @NonNull Class<TYPE> valueClass,
041      @NonNull Class<ITEM_TYPE> itemClass,
042      @NonNull IAtomicOrUnionType.ICastExecutor<ITEM_TYPE> castExecutor) {
043    super(valueClass, itemClass, castExecutor);
044  }
045
046  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
047  @Override
048  public TYPE copy(Object obj) {
049    // Datatype-based types are required to provide a copy method. Delegate to this
050    // method.
051    return ((TYPE) obj).copy();
052  }
053}
